Code Blocks


Simple Code Block

function hello() {
    console.log("Hello, World!");
}

Code Block With Special Characters

<div class="container">
    <h1>Title & Subtitle</h1>
    <p>Text with <em>emphasis</em></p>
</div>

More text after code.
